shoppinglist.languagePrompt: First, please select your language and desired homepage to continue with Murmli.
shoppinglist.welcome:
Welcome to Murmli, your smart app for recipes, shopping, and nutrition.

 This app uses AI to facilitate translations, interpretations, and recipe selection. You can even create your own recipes and transfer them directly to the shopping list to make your daily life more efficient.
shoppinglist.quickGuide:
Simply enter what you need into the input field, and Murmli will use AI to add it to the shopping list.

 All items are sorted directly by supermarket categories so you can find them more easily.

 Once the items are added, you can click on them to find alternatives.
shoppinglist.options: Find more options like sharing or sorting your list in the menu (top right). For example, share the list with your partner to work on it together. You can revoke sharing at any time.

planner.welcome: Set below how many people and how many recipes you want to plan for. In the text field, you can also enter your wishes in natural language, and an AI will automatically consider these when selecting recipes (e.g., vegetarian for athletes).
planner.options:
You will now be shown recipes. 
Give a thumbs up if you like a recipe or a thumbs down if not. 

The system learns from your decisions to make better suggestions.
planner.shoppinglist:
Once you have selected the desired number of recipes, you will automatically be taken to the shopping list. This contains all the ingredients for the recipes. 

 Under 'Recipes', you will find your selected recipes, including instructions. There you can rate the recipes and provide feedback.

recipes.overview: Here is the overview of the recipes that belong to your shopping list, your own recipes, and your favorites. From there, you can access them.
recipes.create: On the plus symbol at the top right, you have the option to create your own recipes. Enter your idea, the AI generates it, and you can even upload a picture of ingredients.
recipes.addToList: If you want to add one of your recipes or favorite recipes to your shopping list, access the recipe and add it via the menu (three dots) at the top right.

tracker.overview:
Simply enter what you have eaten. 

You can describe everything in natural language, such as "a plate of pasta", name specific products, or provide exact calorie details – as you wish.
tracker.calorieGoal:
Define your daily calorie goal yourself or let us calculate it automatically. 

Simply enter your body data once – we will take care of the rest for you.
tracker.activityTracking: Additionally, record your sporting activities, such as "20 minutes jogging". We automatically calculate how many extra calories you can consume – tailored just for you.

setup.aboutApp: This app was privately developed to simplify life with a shopping list and intelligent recipe planning.

general.errorMessage: An error has occurred. Please try again shortly or report this error to us.

deleteRecipeDialog.dialogMsg: Do you really want to remove the selected recipe?

general.name: Name

shoppingList.noItemsMessage: There are no items in the shopping list.
shoppingList.joinedList: You have joined someone else's list.
shoppingList.noSharedUsers: The list has not been shared yet.

sortCategoriesDialog.title: Sort Categories
sortCategoriesDialog.text: Click on a category to set a position or use the arrows.

removeRecipes.dialogMsg: Do you really want to remove all recipes from your shopping list? The ingredients will remain on the shopping list and must be deleted separately.

removeIngredients.dialogMsg: Do you really want to remove all ingredient-related entries from your shopping list? The recipes will remain in the recipe view.

clearAll.dialogMsg: Do you really want to remove all items from your shopping list?

deleteList.dialogMsg: Do you really want to delete your entire shopping list?

shoppingList.voiceRecordingInfo: The voice recording is currently running. You can say in natural language what should be added to your shopping list. Your request will be processed and sent. If you want to discard the recording, you can delete it. As long as you do not send the recording, everything remains local on your device.

planner.title: Recipe Planner
planner.fetchingMessage: Your recipes are being loaded in the background. Please wait.

resetSelectionDialog.dialogMsg: Do you really want to reset your recipe selection?

recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.empty: You haven't created any recipes yet.

createRecipeDialog.title: Generate Recipe
createRecipeDialog.text:
Describe your recipe as detailed as possible: What must be included, what do you want to avoid? The more information you provide, the better we can generate your individual recipe.

After the creation process, it takes about 2–3 minutes for your recipe to appear under 'My Recipes'.

Optionally, you can add a photo – either directly from your gallery or by taking a new picture. This can be a picture of your fridge, individual ingredients, or something that reminds you of your desired recipe.
createRecipeDialog.generatingText: Your recipe is now being created. This can take up to two minutes. You will then find it under 'My Recipes'.

recipes.addIngreditensInfo: Are you sure you want to add the recipe to your current shopping list? All ingredients will be added automatically.
recipes.processingMessage: Your recipe is being created in the background. You will be notified once it is ready.

tips.swipeToRemove: Swipe a recipe left or right to remove it.
tips.createOwn: Tap the plus icon in the top right to create your own recipes.
tips.printPdf: Want to print your recipes? Tap the three-dot menu in the bottom right to create a PDF.
tips.editOwn: You can edit your own recipes at any time. Open the recipe and use the three-dot menu — you'll find all the options there.
tips.feedbackPlanner: Not satisfied with a recipe from the planner? Open it and give feedback via the three-dot menu — we'll take care of it.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.label: Your Feedback
feedback.success:
Thank you for your feedback!
We will take care of it.

settings.title: Settings
settings.confirmDeleteText: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
settings.accountDeleted: Your account has been successfully deleted.
settings.importWarningText: Importing will overwrite all current user data and you will be logged out. Do you want to proceed?

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Reach us through the following channels
contact.footer: We look forward to your message!

tracker.createActivityInfo: Add your activities here, the app will automatically calculate the calories for you.

palOptions.homeOffice: Home Office – sitting, no physical activity
palOptions.salesperson: Salesperson – standing, walking, light physical work
palOptions.waiter: Waiter – lots of walking, carrying plates
palOptions.constructionWorker: Construction Worker – physically demanding, lifting, carrying
palOptions.farmer: Farmer – physical work, lifting, operating machinery
palOptions.constructionSite: Construction Site – heavy physical work, lifting, standing
palOptions.mountainGuide: Mountain Guide – extreme activity, long walks in terrain

tracker.bodyDataInfo: Here you can enter your body data to calculate your calorie goals. These are used to determine your daily calorie goals.
tracker.errorNoBodydata: If you want to use the calorie calculator, you must enter your body data first.
tracker.errorBodydataActivity: If you want to use activity tracking, you must enter your body data first.
tracker.voiceRecordingInfo:
The recording is saved locally on your device. If you want to send the audio file, click Send. 
Alternatively, you can click Discard to not send the recording.
tracker.askDialog: Here you can ask questions about nutrition. The app will try to answer your question, taking into account your body data and your calorie counter entries from the last 14 days. Please note that the answers are based on the information you have entered in the app.
tracker.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your meal or activity in relation to the image

trainingPlans.title: Training Plans

step1.title: Create Training Plan
step1.content: Training plans can be created individually, you can describe everything you want, what you are training for, where, how often a week, and how intense/long.

step2.title: Edit Training Plan
step2.content: If something doesn't fit, you can edit the training plans with natural language. Just write what should be changed, and you will get an updated version.

step3.title: Train
step3.content: Training plans are time-based if activated. Active training plans can be trained and logged, each set individually – weights or repetitions or duration of sets. At the end, you have the option to send the training directly to the calorie counter to track the calories burned.

trainingPlans.createPlanInstructions:
Describe your plan as precisely as possible: What do you want to train? How often a week? In what environment? What type of training do you prefer?

You can also specify the intensity: light, moderate, or intense.

Examples:
'I want to go to the gym four times a week, focusing on the upper body. I am well trained.'

'I have back pain on the left back of the shoulder. Create a plan with targeted exercises for one day a week to improve my posture and alleviate the pain.'

The more information you provide, the more suitable your training plan will be.
trainingPlans.subtitle: Here you can create and manage your training plans.
trainingPlans.confirmDeletePlan: Do you really want to delete this training plan?
trainingPlans.noPlans: You haven't created any training plans yet.
trainingPlans.noPlansInfo: There are no training plans yet. You can add a new training plan with the plus button at the top right.

activateDialog.title: Activate Training Plan
activateDialog.msg:
When you start your training plan, the start date is set. You will then see which week of your training plan you are in.
Do you really want to start the training plan?

deleteDialog.title: Delete Training Plan
deleteDialog.msg: Do you really want to delete this training plan?

finishDialog.title: Finish Training
finishDialog.msg: If you finish the training, the start date and all your progress will be reset. Are you sure you want to finish the training?

trainingPlans.processingMessage: Your training plan is being created in the background. You will be notified once it is ready.
trainingPlans.readyMessage: Your training plan has been created.
trainingPlans.enterQuestion: Ask a question about this plan
trainingPlans.askDialog: You can ask questions about this training plan. The most recent training logs (up to 10) will be included.
trainingPlans.continuePlanDescription: Create a new plan based on this training plan. You can optionally add any preferences.

training.title: Training Log
training.noPlan: No training is planned for today or the plan contains no exercises.
training.cancelTrainingConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel the training?
